Name: Brits Spritz
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of squeeze grapefruit wedge into drink & add cucumber slice.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: An elderflower Spritz with depth of flavour and British character courtesy of Kamm & Sons
History: Created by Alex Kammerling of Kamm & Sons, this is the brand's signature cocktail. See Spritz cocktail history and more recipes
Nutrition: One serving of Brits Spritz contains 168 calories
